hero.title: Support Engineer & Site Lead @ Accenture | Infrastructure Manager
hero.subtitle: Support Engineer & Site Lead @ Accenture | Infrastructure Manager
hero.bio:
Support Engineer & Site Lead at Accenture for enterprise mining operations and Infrastructure Manager at Jujuy Water Utility, leading technical teams and coordinating 24/7 critical infrastructure.

Specialized in IT team supervision, Azure/cloud, Cisco networking, automation, and digital transformation. Certified Cisco CCNA, Furukawa Fiber Optic, and MikroTik RouterOS.

Experience in IT asset management, technical mentoring, and high-complexity enterprise projects.
